text.data: Matelite: Hmm... It seems we've made it to Mahal.[end]T
Taicho: Let us hurry and take off![end]S
Sendak: Taicho seems quite anxious...[end]M

Matelite: I can't blame him... Mahal was also destroyed by the Empire... And Taicho was known as the finest soldier there...
Kahna's best soldier... Hey, then he's the same as me! His pain is the same as mine![end]S

Sendak: Yes, yes... When the Empire attacked Mahal they fought dirty...
What should we do, [character][0x1]...? We might have to fight dirty too...[end]M
Matelite: What are you saying, Master Sendak!![end]I
I'm getting on a dragon now![end][0x0]
Even if they fight dirty, we must fight fairly! That is what it is to be a knight![end]S

Sendak: [character][0x1]...
We do not know how to fight dirty...[end]T
Truce: Captain [character][0x1]!! I've come up with a plan for Mahal. Would you like to hear it?[end]
Listen Don't listen[end1]I
I... I see... Even though I stayed up all night working on it...[end]L
Let's take a look at a map of Mahal.[end]T
Truce: An excellent plan don't you think?! A piece of cake, right?![end]S
Sendak: Well, [character][0x1]. Shall we go?[end]
Wait Let's go![end1]S
Since you're about to take off, will you buy something?[end]
Weapons Armor Items[end1]T
Thank you.[end]I
It seems everyone else is already on a dragon now. Will you buy something?[end][end]
